thread.title: ‘What Does Paranoid Mean?’ The Story Behind the Black Sabbath Hit

author: Marc Myers
title: ‘What Does Paranoid Mean?’ The Story Behind the Black Sabbath Hit
text:
In early 1971, when Black Sabbath released its second album, “Paranoid,” in the United States, the band was among only a few groups pioneering hard rock driven by metallic-sounding guitar riffs and wailing vocals.
The title song, released as a single, helped push the album to No. 12 on the Billboard chart and quickly inspired a wave of heavy-metal bands.
Recently,...
